snippet: SCHATTEN--Ira. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Ira Schatten, who leaves behind a loving family to carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Ira's beloved wife, Alma; his siblings, Philip (Cheryl Fishbein) and Marlene Rosen (Jay); his children, Debbie Kadosh (Siman), Sandy Schatten, Rebecca Schneider (Scott) and Solomon (Bonnie); his grandchildren; his great- grandchild; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHATTEN--Ira. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Ira Schatten, who leaves behind a loving family to carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Ira's beloved wife, Alma; his siblings, Philip (Cheryl Fishbein) and Marlene Rosen (Jay); his children, Debbie Kadosh (Siman), Sandy Schatten, Rebecca Schneider (Scott) and Solomon (Bonnie); his grandchildren; his great- grandchild; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
